text:
Would it be possible to create two serverless function endpoints and the flow would go

1. browser form posts something to serverless_fn_1 (_*if* this cannot be called directly with eg. curl as we don’t want to build a free proxy_)
2. serverless_fn_1 has the secrets to initiate the authentication
3. serverless_fn_1 redirects the user to the authentication with return URL to the main site
4. user goes away and comes back to HubSpot with token=12345 in the query string
5. user browser posts to serverless_fn_2 the token
6. serverless_fn_2 returns the data to user
